feed.title: Changes for version 0.6 are being pulled into HEAD

entry.title: Changes for version 0.6 are being pulled into HEAD
entry.summary: Mike Hearn raised a concern about Git not producing helpful summaries when every commit is a merge. He suggested that this makes it difficult to guess what a change does based on the name of the topic branch. In response, someone suggested using the command `git log --no-merges` to address the issue.
